payload.title: Update factory_module.md - 7/7 Factories Complete
payload.description: Update factory_module.md blueprint to reflect complete implementation of all 7 factory functions. Update capability tables, add detailed orchestration for ExecutionRecord, ChangelogRecord, FeedbackRecord factories, and fix corrupted content in the document.
payload.notes: Updated factory_module.md with complete 7/7 factory implementation. Added detailed orchestration for new factories, updated EARS traceability matrix, fixed corrupted content, and updated cross-references. All factories now follow consistent pattern with defaults + validation.
